TypeNameUtils.h

00001 #ifndef TYPENAMEUTILS_H_
00002 #define TYPENAMEUTILS_H_
00003 
00004 #include "TypeRegistry.h"
00005 #include "TypeDesc.h"
00006 
00007 #include <vector>
00008 #include <string>
00009 #include <locale>
00010 
00011 struct TypeNameUtils
00012 {
00013         struct Token
00014         {
00015                 enum Type
00016                 {
00017                         IDENTIFIER = 1,
00018                         STRING     = 2,
00019                         NUMBER     = 3,
00020                         KEYWORD    = 4,
00021                         OTHER      = 5
00022                 };
00023 
00024                 Type type;
00025                 std::string::size_type beg, len;
00026 
00027                 bool valid() const { return (len>0 || len==std::string::npos) && beg!=std::string::npos; }
00028 
00029                 Token(): type(OTHER), beg(std::string::npos), len(std::string::npos) {}
00030         };
00031 
00032         typedef std::vector<Token> TokenList;
00033 
00034         static std::string trim(const std::string &s);
00035         static void tokenize(const std::string &s, TokenList &tokens);
00036         static std::string qualifyIdentifier(const std::string &id, const TypeDesc &scope, const TypeRegistry &reg);
00037         static void qualifyAllIdentifiers(std::string &s, const TypeDesc &scope, const TypeRegistry &reg);
00038         static std::string removeGarbageFromSpecifier(const std::string &type_spec);
00039         static std::string removeModifiersFromSpecifier(const std::string &type_spec);
00040         static std::string getUnqualifiedIdentifier(const std::string &id);
00041         static std::string getNamespace(const std::string &id);
00042         static bool hasDefaults(const ParameterList &pl);
00043         static bool splitTemplateDeclaration(const std::string &decl, std::string &name, StringList &params);
00044         static void translateIdentifiers(std::string &decl, const std::string &src, const std::string &dest);
00045 };
00046 
00047 #endif
